content: * this is the ad-free printable pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern at theturtletrunk com* this pdf includes 3 crochet patterns make a tree wreath or spiraled ribbon bundle and use them as tree ornaments gift toppers or string them together to make a garland these patterns work up quickly and use minimal yarn so it s the perfect project for using up scrap yarn difficulty easy supplies needed - medium 4 weight yarn - 4 00mm g hook - yarn needle - scissors pdf includes - detailed written instructions - link to free video tutorials - reference photos
